name: Pop + Lock Frizz Control + Glossing Serum
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:A unique oil-and-serum formula that smooths frizz and flyaways, seals split ends, and adds sparkling shine to wet or dry hair for color that pops..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Shine.Key Benefits:- Tames frizz and flyaways, seals split ends.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hydrating Complex: Infuses hydration and moisture into hair..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This unique oil-and-serum blend works inside the hair to restore elasticity and suppleness. On the outside, it forms a crystal-clear, UV-protectant shield to seal the cuticle and smooth split ends. The result is healthier, silkier hair with an ultra-glossy finish that renews day-one color vibrancy.
ingredients: -Hydrating Complex: Infuses hydration and moisture into hair..-Serum Blend: Smooths, seals, and adds gloss to surface of hair..-Ethylhexyl Salicylate: Protects hair from UV damage...Propylene Glycol, Aqua/Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Hexylene Glycol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dimethiconol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Mica, Fragrance/Parfum, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Laureth-7, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Butylene Glycol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use on wet or dry hair. .-On wet hair: Apply a few drops to hands and distribute through hair, concentrating on lower lengths and ends. Style as desired. .-On dry hair: Apply a few drops to hands and smooth lightly through hair sections as desired for a frizz-free, glossy, and polished finish.

reviews.review_text: I bought this hoping it was a smoothing type Of product that was easy to work with and it’s not. I have thick wavy hair and when used whether I blow dry or air dry it immediately dries out my hair and makes it feel really stiff .. I also would have a lot of glitter all over my hands to wash off .. will not purchase again.
